entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is trying to find a way out of his picture and back into Hogwarts.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a professor at Hogwarts whose portrait is mentioned in the story.

entities.name: phineas nigellus
entities.description: Phineas Nigellus is another professor at Hogwarts whose portrait is being spoken to by Harry.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is the school where Harry and Phineas Nigellus are located.

relationships.description: Harry asks Dumbledore's portrait to come into Phineas Nigellus' picture.
Phineas Nigellus responds to Harry's request by turning his face in the direction of Harry's voice.
